00045 class SearchResultElement {
00046 public:
00053    SearchResultElement(const SearchMapItem* item,
00054                        int partNbr,
00055                        SearchMatchPoints* points,
00056                        int nameNbr,
00057                        uint32 stringInfo,
00058                        const MapRights& rights)

00062            m_nameNbr(nameNbr),
00063            m_stringInfo(stringInfo),
00064            m_mapRights( rights ) {
00065    }
00066 
00067    ~SearchResultElement() {
00068       delete m_points;
00069    }

00120 class SearchResult {
00121 public:
00122 
00126    SearchResult(const SearchMap2* theMap) : m_map(theMap) {
00127       // UGGLE: getNbrItems in map and sizeof(uint32), please.
00128       m_indexArray = new uint32[theMap->end()-theMap->begin()];
00129       memset(m_indexArray, 0xff, (theMap->end()-theMap->begin())*4);
00130    }
00131 
00135    ~SearchResult() {
00136       STLUtility::deleteValues( m_storage );
00137       delete [] m_indexArray;
00138    }
00139    
00145    inline bool addResult(SearchResultElement* item,
00146                          LangTypes::language_t reqLang);
00147 
00149    typedef vector<SearchResultElement*> storage_t;
00150    
00154    typedef storage_t::iterator iterator;
00155    
00159    typedef storage_t::const_iterator const_iterator;
00160 
00161    const_iterator begin() const { return m_storage.begin(); }
00162    const_iterator end() const { return m_storage.end(); }
00163    uint32 size() const { return m_storage.size(); }
00164 private:
00168    storage_t m_storage;
00169 
00174    const SearchMap2* m_map;
00175 
00181    uint32* m_indexArray;
00182 
00186    uint32 m_nameCompIdx[2];
00187 };
00188 
00189 inline bool
00190 SearchResult::addResult(SearchResultElement* resItem,
00191                         LangTypes::language_t reqLang)
00192 {
00193    const uint32 index = resItem->getItem()->getIndex(m_map);
00194    if ( m_indexArray[index] == MAX_UINT32 ) {
00195       m_indexArray[index] = m_storage.size();
00196       m_storage.push_back(resItem);
00197       return true;
00198    } else {
00199       // If we got more points this time -> remove old one
00200       // FIXME: Add check for language etc.
00201       SearchResultElement* oldElem = m_storage[m_indexArray[index]];
00202 
00203       // Replace if the new element has more points than the
00204       // other one.
00205       bool replace = resItem->getPoints() > oldElem->getPoints();
00206 
00207       // Override the points if the lanugages differ, but
00208       // only if the matches have the same points.
00209       if ( ( oldElem->getNameInfo() != resItem->getNameInfo() ) &&
00210            ( oldElem->getPoints() == resItem->getPoints() ) ) {
00211          // Check if one name is better than the other
00212          m_nameCompIdx[0] = oldElem->getNameInfo();
00213          m_nameCompIdx[1] = resItem->getNameInfo();
00214          if ( NameUtility::getBestName(2, m_nameCompIdx, reqLang) == 1 ) {
00215             // The index of the resItem was returned. The old one should
00216             // be replaced
00217             replace = true;
00218          } else {
00219             replace = false;
00220          }
00221       }
00222 
00223       
00224       if ( replace ) {
00225          // Remove the one in the vector.
00226          delete m_storage[ m_indexArray[index] ];
00227          m_storage[ m_indexArray[index] ] = resItem;
00228       } else {
00229          delete resItem;
00230       }
00231       return replace;
00232    }
00233 }
